Class Enemy

java.lang.Object
Entity
Enemy
public class Enemy extends Entity
Enemy AI-controlled entity.

Extends Entity and implements enemy behaviour such as chasing the player within a detection range, jumping when appropriate, colliding with the player to apply damage, taking damage from bullets, and updating sprite animations based on state (idle, walking, running, aerial, hurt).

Author:
psyjr14

  • Field Details

    • isRunning

      public boolean isRunning
      True when the enemy is moving faster to get player.

    • isFacingForwards

      public boolean isFacingForwards
      Current facing direction used for rendering/animation.

  • Constructor Details

    • Enemy

      public Enemy(int x, int y, int health, javafx.scene.image.Image[] idleSprites, javafx.scene.image.Image[] walkingSprites, javafx.scene.image.Image[] runningSprites, javafx.scene.image.Image hurtSprite)
      Constructs a new enemy at the given position.

      Enemy health is initialised to 2 (ignoring the health parameter in the current implementation), with ammo set to 0 and a fixed hitbox.

      Parameters:
      x - initial x-position in pixels
      y - initial y-position in pixels
      health - (currently unused) requested starting health
      idleSprites - idle animation sprites
      walkingSprites - walking animation sprites
      runningSprites - running animation sprites
      hurtSprite - sprite shown while hurt

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update(Player p, List<Enemy> enemies, List<MapBlock> blocks)
      Per-frame update for enemy AI.

      Applies gravity, decides whether the player is within aggro range, moves toward the player, performs jump logic, handles collision with the player, applies hurt timers, and updates animation state.

      Parameters:
      p - player to chase and collide with
      enemies - list of enemies (available for group behaviour if needed)
      blocks - map blocks used for collision detection

    • distanceFromPlayer

      public double distanceFromPlayer(Player p)
      Computes the straight-line distance from this enemy to the player.
      Parameters:
      p - player instance
      Returns:
      Euclidean distance in pixels

    • collidesPlayer

      public boolean collidesPlayer(Player p)
      Checks whether this enemy overlaps the player hit area.
      Parameters:
      p - player instance
      Returns:
      true if the enemy intersects the player

    • isMoving

      public boolean isMoving()
      Checks whether the enemy is currently moving horizontally.
      Returns:
      true if horizontal speed is non-zero

    • updateState

      public void updateState()
      Updates the enemy logical state (idle, walking, running, aerial, hurt) based on movement, grounded status, and damage state.

    • animate

      public void animate()
      Updates the current sprite based on Entity.state and timing.

    • damage

      public void damage()
      Applies damage to the enemy if not currently in the damaged state.

      Reduces health by 1, triggers a brief hurt window, and applies upward knockback.

    • isDead

      public boolean isDead()
      Checks whether the enemy should be considered dead.
      Returns:
      true if health is depleted or the enemy fell out of bounds
